post_content:
This November I am wanting to buy 1 or 2 big T206 HOFers and right now I am trying to get a sense of what might be available so I can prioritize, as I will not have the funds to purchase everything I want. Below is what I am looking for - my budget will require lower grades, in the 1-2 range. If you have anything you'd be open to selling in November, please send me a DM. Thank you!

T206 Ty Cobb Green
T206 Ty Cobb Bat On
T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off
T206 Cy Young Bare Hand Shows
T206 Cy Young with Glove
T206 Christy Mathewson White Cap
T206 Nap Lajoie Portrait
T206 Nap Lajoie Throwing

Backs not important for these cards. 

Chris
